register.description: This register contains the DisplaySubSystem revision number

bitfield.description: Software Reset. [[br]]Set this bit to 1 to trigger a module reset. [[br]]The bit is automatically reset by the hardware. [[br]]During reads, it alwatys returns 0.

bitenum.description: Automatic OCP clock gating strategy is applied on the OCP interface activity.

register.description: This register indicates the source of the interrupt and the status of the interrupt line.

bitfield.description: Selects the Video port from DISPC between Video port #1 and Video port #2 (mux #10)

bitenum.description: Video Port #2 (also named secondary LCD output or LCD2) is selected.
Video Port #1 (also named primary LCD output or LCD1) is selected (backward compatibility mode)

bitfield.description: DSS_CLK/PLL2_CLK1 clock switch (mux #3). [[br]]Selects the clock source for the DISPC LCD2_CLK clock.
Selects the clock source for the DISPC functional clock.
DSS_CLK/PLL1_CLK1 clock switch (mux #2). [[br]]Selects the clock source for the DISPC LCD1_CLK clock.
Video port selection status (mux #11) Indiactes if video port #1 or video port #2 from DISPC is used to provide data to the RFBI.

bitenum.description: Video Port #2 (named also secondary LCD output or LCD2) used to provide data to RFBI
Video Port #1 (named also as primary LCD output or LCD1) used to provide data to RFBI

bitfield.description: FCK_CLK clock selection status (mux #1) indicates which clock is used by the glitch free mux selecting the source of FCK_CLK. [[br]]It is required to have the current clock and the new selected clock being running in order to be able to switch. [[br]]Both clocks are used at the same time while the switch is on going.

bitenum.description: PLL3_CLK1 (TV_CLK) is used by DISPC as FCK_CLK clock
PLL2_CLK1 is used by DISPC as FCK_CLK clock
PLL1_CLK1 is used by DISPC as FCK_CLK clock
DSS_CLK is used by DISPC as FCK_CLK clock

bitfield.description: LCD2_CLK clock selection status (mux #3) indicates which clock is used by the glitch free mux selecting the source of LCD2_CLK. [[br]]It is required for the current clock and the new selected clock being running in order to be able to switch. [[br]]Both clocks are are used at the same time while the switch is on going.

bitenum.description: PLL2_CLK2 is used by DISPC as LCD2_CLK clock
DSS_CLK is used by DSI1 as LCD2_CLK clock

bitfield.description: LCD1_CLK clock selection status (mux #2) indicates which clock is used by the glitch free mux selecting the source of LCD1_CLK. [[br]]It is required for the current clock and the new selected clock being running in order to be able to switch. [[br]]Both clocks are are used at the same time while the switch is on going.

bitenum.description: PLl1_CLK1 is used by DISPC as LCD1_CLK
